body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good afternoon! My name is Dylan Brown, and I'm with Cornerstone Cafe's Customer Support. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, hello, my name is Sara Reed. I'm contacting you because there's an issue with the pricing on my last order, and frankly, I'm quite upset about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that you're experiencing this issue, Sara. I'll do my best to resolve this as quickly as possible. Could I get the order number and the date of the order, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the order number is AB one two three four five six, and the date was the fifth of April.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. Let me quickly look up the details of your order. One moment, please.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I've found your order. It seems there was indeed a mistake in the pricing. We're terribly sorry about this inconvenience. We will correct the billing amount and issue a refund for the overcharged amount.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for confirming that. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue. How long will it take for the refund to be processed?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: The refund should be processed within five to seven business days. You will receive a confirmation email once it's been initiated.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Alright, that sounds good. Thank you, Dylan, for your assistance today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sara! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that'll be all. Thanks again.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It was my pleasure to help. Thank you for contacting Cornerstone Cafe's Customer Support. Have a great day!
